name: Coinverse
description:
Story & Gameplay

Welcome to Coinverse! In this world, the citizens live on a huge flat earth, which they only call The Coin. It is possible to enter the other side of this coin though if one steps onto the platform in the middle! If you do, make sure to kill all enemies and gain a token or you can never return to the real side of the coin!

You can buy Upgrades with these tokens when you just go to the little village!

Controls

W, A, S, D: Move
Shift: Run
Space: Jump
Left Mouse: Shoot
Right Mouse: Aim
1 / 2: Weapon-Select (AK / Glock)
R: Reload
